name: Acquire the Amulet!
description:
Delve in to the dungeons of an ancient castle to recover the powerful relic!

A simple yet challenging platforming game for the TIC-80. Find a sword, slay the bosses, get the amulet and escape the castle.

My first jab at TIC-80.

The game is also available at https://tic80.com/play?cart=2841

Following assets were used modified:

https://opengameart.org/content/8x8-character-and-sprite-sheet (Public Domain)
https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-skeleton (CC-BY 4.0)
https://opengameart.org/content/ikaros (CC-BY 3.0)
https://opengameart.org/content/crazy-wizard (CC-BY 3.0)
https://thebuffed.itch.io/tiny-8x8-dungeon
